extendedInfo.description: Split your bills in style!Eat N Split allows you to split bill items between friends in 3 easy steps.- Add items: Add bill items, by entering Item Price, Item Quantity, and Item Name (optional)- Assign Items to people: From the matrix, select people for each item. (You can assign names to people by clicking the columns)- Add taxes and tips by entering Percent and Name (optional)You're done! You'll be able to view the breakdown of your bill per person, including taxes, tips and items.Check out this link for more info: http://bit.ly/pCBRS6

reviews.title: Decimal
reviews.comment: I\'m using this in the USA & it would be nice if I can put decimal for everything. Pizza 5.50  Tax 8.75. Please fix! Otherwise it is an awesome app. If add another function such as savw reciept. That would be nice.
reviews.author: Christina S

reviews.title: contents doesn\'t fit background correctly
reviews.comment: Text is\'t showing in the white space on my screen (Atrix)
reviews.author: A Google User
